name: //localhost
description:
This game was made in 2 days for the 2019 Global Game Jam in Alberta, Canada.

://localhost is a multiplayer battle game for 2-4 players.  The goal is to take over as many of the visible nodes as you can within the time limit.

Instructions:
Have one web browser click the CREATE HOST button.
Every other player should click on the server if it shows up OR click the REFRESH button to search for running games.
